ygData.msgSnippet: You may remember that a couple of months ago we were discussing the RAM requirement and the number of neurons required for the 4-card puzzle.  Mr. Emile

Subject: On the RAM requirement for the 4-card puzzle

You may remember that a couple of months ago we were
discussing the RAM requirement and the number of
neurons required for the 4-card puzzle.  Mr. Emile
Richard has written an analysis of a procedural
programming approach to this problem.  It is in the
Blog section of the ANNEvolve website.

=====
Mitchell Timin
